post:
hi.
In need of cheap VPSs in the locations below. as per my client's needs, the IP WHOIS MUST match the location of the server. yes, I can get these at many places, but I would rather prefer getting many from fewer providers.

min specs:

• 256MB RAM

• 5GB HD (but even less suffice)

• 25GB of Bandwidth (I use much much less, but...)
• 1 IPV4

• CentOS 6+

• $10/year MAX

locations (remember, IP WHOIS must match the geo):

Phoenix, San Jose, Miami, Tampa, Atlanta, Chicago, Boston, Kansas City, Las Vegas, NYC, Columbus, Portland and Dallas.

if you have any of these (at least 2 or 3), please PM me a sample IPs I would expect to get with the VPS and specs.

thanks, SJ
